summary: So many followers... So little time.
descriptionHtml:
Shadow uses a specially enchanted Angel Sword. Shadow also uses 8 customized spells designed by me that allow her to raise all kinds of thralls, summon a variety of uncommon creatures, ghostwalk teleport, levitate targets and shoot through the sky in pursuit of her targets.

Shadow requires:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI 4.1[/url] or higher - Not included [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE 1.7.0[/url] - Not included [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url] - Not included 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard[/url] - Not included  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] - Not included  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] - Not included
 
NMM Install or Unpack and move Data to your Skyrim folder.
After install move Data\My Games to Documents.
Ariana.rtf in Data\My Games has detailed instructions.

Q: Are you gonna make standalone? No.
Q: [url=http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73598-8-1455712819.jpg]Where is she[/url]?

Thanks to all the authors and uploaders whos mods make Ariana so amazing.
author: AngelWyngs
